citation.article-title: Taxonomy of the family Halobacteriaceae and the description of two new genera Halorubrobacterium and Natrialba.
citation.source: The Journal of General and Applied Microbiology

p.s: Description of Halorubrobacterium coriensis sp. nov.
Halorubrobacterium coriensis (co.ri.e'ns.is. L. adj. coriensis, from corio; referring
to the place of origin, a saltern along Corio Bay, Geelong, Australia)
The properties of the type strain are the same as those published previously for the strain Ch2 (24).
